column1: Little Goat Diner////Chicago favorite! I love the crazy menu Little Goat has to offer. My absolute favorite is the nachos
column2: it usually makes me full before the entree comes (although this does not stop me from eating more). The food is very flavorful
column4: and just a lot of fun to eat. The ambience is very upbeat and playful
column5: I feel comfortable going with friends or a fun date night
column6: nothing too serious. The price range is clearly above any regular diner
column7: but the place really tries to maintain the light
column8: comfortable ambience of a diner and I really appreciate the amazing food that comes along with it. I've definitely never had a dining experience like this place!
